We collect and process data when you:
When you visit our websites, we may collect information from you automatically through cookies or similar technology.
When you use the Tabtastic service, either via the Tabtastic website or by interacting with the Tabtastic Discord bot, we collect and process the following data: Billing information (Billing Address)

When you use the Tabtastic service, either via the Tabtastic website or by interacting with the Tabtastic Discord bot, we collect and process the following data: Connected accounts on other platforms (Discord & Zoom account identifiers)

When you use the Tabtastic service, either via the Tabtastic website or by interacting with the Tabtastic Discord bot, we collect and process the following data: Personal identification information (Name, Email Address)

Tabtastic will keep your personal data for as long as you retain your account with us.
